text: Tom Emiel Gerardine Alo√Øs Lanoye (born August 27, 1958 in Sint-Niklaas) is a Belgian writer, poet and columnist. Lanoye writes novels and playwrights as well as poetry and scenarios. He got many awards, among them the Constantijn Huygens Prize. Lanoye is an atheist.www.knack.be == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian atheists Category:Belgian journalists Category:Belgian novelists Category:Belgian poets Category:Columnists Category:Belgian playwrights Category:Belgian screenwriters Category:People from East Flanders
title: Tom Lanoye
